alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:54AM EDT until April 05 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT/1030 AM CDT/ FOR ELKHART...ST. JOSEPH...NORTHERN KOSCIUSKO... WESTERN LAGRANGE...EASTERN STARKE...MARSHALL...CASS...WESTERN ST. JOSEPH AND SOUTHEASTERN BERRIEN COUNTIES... At 1054 AM EDT/954 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mattawan to near Niles to Koontz Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elkhart, Simonton Lake, Cassopolis, Lakeville, Bremen, Wakarusa, White Pigeon, Three Rivers, Constantine, Dunlap, New Paris, Goshen, Middlebury and Millersburg. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 74 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/ for north central, northeastern and northwestern Indiana...and southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
